channel.title: Changin client background?
channel.description:
i downloaded a 317 source and it has one of those runescape backgrounds with the fire and stuff.....
when i replaced my image with the one that was default then the right side of the pic got inversed and the flames were still there and its all fucked up....
how can i fix this to make it just a plain background

item.title: Changin client background?
item.dc:creator: @Gypsy Gypsy
item.description:
@Gypsy wrote:

You went into file>spirts?> usually called “Title” and changed that to the image you wanted right?

BTW, this goes in the client help section not server help

Read full topic

item.title: Changin client background?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

alright thanks i got it flipped so it looks better but does anyone know how to remove the flames?
